remarks: Being a unitic polynomial.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
uc1pval.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
uc1pval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
uc1pval.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` P ) $.
uc1pval.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
uc1pval.c $e |- C = ( Unic1p ` R ) $.
uc1pval.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
isuc1p $p |- ( F e. C <-> ( F e. B /\ F =/= .0. /\ ( ( coe1 ` F ) ` ( D ` F ) ) e. U ) ) $.
